name: FinFam
Description: Created on a team for my first ever hackathon hosted by GA. Worked alongside a team of fellow engineers and designers on the challenge of making finances more accessible. We got the team together and decided to go with a target user group of families and the app being a budgeting app that allows users to have multiple family members (future enhancement) contribute to the budget and a progress bar that allows the families to set saving goals and visualize the progress they make. Created using Figma for design iteration, react for frontend and node.js for backend. It was a fun experience working alongside a cross functioning team and creating production level code and then presenting it within 48 hours.

name: FinGem.io
Description: An Ed Tech app built using React Native for my capstone project where I taught myself the tech in order to build an app for which I've been doing user testing and planning for with my non-profit since 2016. The app is built to be a gamified platform for teens to learn financial literacy. Going to market soon.

name: Bud
Description: a simple web app that allows you to create your own budget in a calming simple to use environment. We worked in a team of 3 engineers to create this project. I had the role of Product Manager and Frontend help. We used Ruby on Rails backend and React frontend

name: Fantasy News
Description: a simple web app that allows you to look up the latest fantasy football news based on team and post/edit your roster. Future enhancement, user auth. Build using React, MongoDB, Mongoose, Node, Bulma, Express

name: Jordans X
Description: a simple web app that allows you to post your Jordans up for sale and buy Jordans on the site, similar to Stock X. Has User auth working. Build using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MongoDB, Mongoose, Node, Bcrypt, Dotenv, Bulma, EJS, Express

name: Crypto X
Description: a simple web app that uses the coinbase api to pull up any crypto to currency exchange rate. Build using HTML, CSS, JS, JQuery
